meta.description: Sistema offline-first para gestão de tesouraria de igrejas com suporte a múltiplas filiais, controle de membros, reconciliação bancária inteligente e relatórios fiscais.

tech_stack.styling: Tailwind CSS (Dark/Light mode support via 'class' strategy)
tech_stack.persistence: Supabase (PostgreSQL) - Hybrid Architecture (Online-first with local caching)

components.inputs: Rounded-lg border border-gray-300 dark:border-slate-600 bg-white dark:bg-slate-700 outline-none focus:ring-2

transactions.transfer_logic: Atomic pair creation: 1 Debit (Source) + 1 Credit (Target) linked by relatedTransactionId
transactions.validation: Amount > 0, Description required, FundId required, AccountId required.

users.permissions: Granular permissions object (UserPermissions) for non-admin roles.

funds.purpose: Segregation of resources (e.g., Building Fund vs General Fund).

accounting.structure: Simplified Chart of Accounts (Plano de Contas) linked to Categories and Accounts.

matching_logic.exact: Same Date AND Same Amount (within 0.01 tolerance)
matching_logic.probable: Date within +/- 3 days AND Same Amount

reconciliation.import: Supports OFX parsing via Regex/String manip or Gemini AI for complex formats.

security.auth: SHA-256 password hashing via Web Crypto API (Client-side) + Supabase Auth integration pending.
security.data_privacy: Data stored in Supabase (Cloud). Sensitive operations (System Reset) protected by Admin role.

scheduled.logic: Generates real transaction upon confirmation. Supports finite or infinite occurrences.

tools.ofx_converter: Uses Gemini 1.5 Flash to convert PDF/Text bank statements to OFX.

constraints: Ensure all UI changes support Dark Mode.
Keep the file structure flat (root directory) as per project convention.
